title: Hollywood's Wild West (Documentary) Cowboys, Indians, and the Silver Screen

sources.title: Hollywood's Wild West (Documentary) Cowboys, Indians, and the Silver Screen
sources.description:
Cinema has shaped both the understanding and misunderstanding of First Nations culture and history. 

This documentary explores the evolution of First Nations representation in film, from the silent era to the present day. Featuring clips from hundreds of iconic movies and candid interviews with renowned Native and non-Native directors, writers, and actors. This thought-provoking journey reveals the power of film in defining—and redefining—the image of Indigenous peoples on screen.

Directors: Neil Diamond, Catherine Bainbridge, Jeremiah Hayes
Genres: Documentary, Western, Film History


@CultCinemaClassics
